summary: The diff modifies frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json. The summary for AdminPanelPage.tsx confirms REQ-103 is implemented (no internal async gates, defaults to Products tab). However, there is no evidence of changes to AdminAccessControl.tsx or useActor.ts, which are required by REQ-102 and REQ-104 respectively. The diff only shows modifications to two metadata/summary files, not the actual component source files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Rewrite frontend/src/components/AdminAccessControl.tsx with a fully self-contained manual username-entry gate using local status state, polling actor with 10-second timeout, styled form with heading 'Admin Access', onSubmit handler calling isAdminUsername, granted/denied/timeout states, inline error display, retry resets to form, and sunset theme applied.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any changes to frontend/src/components/AdminAccessControl.tsx. The file is not listed in added, modified, or removed files. Only frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts to ensure agent host is https://ic0.app in production, correct canister ID resolution, synchronous actor creation, surfaced initialisation errors, and actor re-creation on login/logout.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any changes to frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts. The file is not listed in added, modified, or removed files.
